column4: I have had problems with my cd/dvd driver. They mount the media, but sometimes they fail. Do you think that I have to clean their lens up with alcohol?
maybe you need to clean the lens, but just use a brush - no alcohol. you might want to clean the rubber grips that hold the CD in place. If that doesn't work, buy a new drive
My drive is not old. About 5 months old
then return it as faulty (at least, in the UK I would do that as we get a 12 month warantee on most stuff)
